definitions.text: a secret scheme to do something (especially something underhand or illegal)
examples: they concocted a plot to discredit the governor
I saw through his little game from the start

definitions.text: a small area of ground covered by specific vegetation
the story that is told in a novel or play or movie etc.
examples: the characters were well drawn but the plot was banal

definitions.text: a chart or map showing the movements or progress of an object

examples: They plotted the overthrow of the government

definitions.text: make a schematic or technical drawing of that shows interactions among variables or how something is constructed
devise the sequence of events in (a literary work or a play, movie, or ballet)
examples: the writer is plotting a new novel
